overview: When Ariella Ferrera gets sick of her dejected husband ignoring her requests for sex, she turns to his successful brother Brad Knight. Sergeant detective Seth Gamble negotiates the release of suspect Kenzie Taylor, who then stalks him until he gives her a psych evaluation. When French tourist Savana Styles mistakes John Strong's house for a hotel, she'll do anything to be able to stay there. Cuckolded husband Johnny Castle confronts his cheating wife Ariella Ferrera after learning she fucked her brother.
tagline: She Begged With No Luck, She Betrayed And He Fucked
title: Betrayal
